Title: Pingu and the Stranger
Plot: Pingu has gone out to get some fish from the fish stall. While he?s on the way, two strangers enter the village, and are shunned by everyone they meet. Pingu arrives at the fish stall, gets out his shopping list and is about to tell the stallholder what he wants when the stallholder sees the two strangers, who are just behind Pingu.
